nj_quote: Everyone suffers in their life. There are many Sad Days. But rather than Sad Days, We hope to have Better days. That’s what makes us live. That’s what makes us dream.
sj_quote: Keep it up! I always support you.
yg_quote: You were born to be real, not to be perfect.
hs_quote: If you don't work hard, there won't be good results ♡.
jm_quote: No matter how hard it is right now, think of what the result will make you feel.
th_quote: Hard work will never betray you.
quote1: It always seems impossible until it's done. You can do it!
quote2: If you think you're going to crash, step on the pedal harder.
quote3: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quote4: Some people dream of accomplishing great things. Others stay awake and make it happen.
quote5: Challenges are what make life interesting. Overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
quote6: Your presence can give happiness. I hope you remember that.
quote7: In the middle of the road, in the moment you want to give up, shout out even louder: “So what?”
